New Records: Rohit Sharma broke AB de Villiers's 8-year-old record for most sixes in a calendar year in ODIs with 59 sixes in 2023
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma and Shubman Gill added 90 in the first 10 overs
Rohit Sharma broke the record for most sixes in a calendar year in ODIs with 59 sixes in 2023
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and went in with an unchanged XI
India are assured of a semi-finals berth and they will face New Zealand in a repeat of the 2019 semi-final, in Mumbai on Wednesday
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's change in approach has shone through in the World Cup as the skipper has scored nearly 500 runs at a strike rate of over 120, playing fearless cricket at the top
Miscellaneous Highlights: India captain Rohit Sharma continued his ruthless run at the top in the ongoing ODI World Cup as he gave India a rapid start in their final league game of the tournament against the Netherlands in Bengaluru on Sunday
The crowd was building up on the festival day at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium and they were treated to some ruthless, and high-quality hitting from the two Indian openers
